p: Cytotoxic medications which are commonly known as cytotoxic chemotherapy are the drugs that utilized to kill various types of cancer cells by the inhibition of cell division and in this way cause the death of cancer cells. In addition to the fact that cytotoxic products can be utilized to destroy tumors, they also can boost the outcomes of radiotherapy or surgery and reduce metastases and cancer symptoms [ 37]. Hela cells were exposed to increasing concentrations of each tested plant sample (6.4, 3.2, 1.6, 0.8, 0.4, 0.2, 0.1, 0.05, 0.025, and 0.0125 mg/ml) for 24 h, and the cell viability was quantified using an MTS assay.
